mapper.select: select IFNULL(sum(resources_num),0) from resources_occupation where prod_id = (select prod_id from prod_inst where prod_inst_id = #{PROD_INST_ID}) and start_date = #{START_DATE} and start_time = #{START_TIME} AND OCCUPY_TYPE=1 OR (OCCUPY_TYPE=0 and NOW()-RECORD_TIME <= 1800)
mapper.insert: insert into resources_occupation set serial = (select CUST_ORDER_NBR from offer_inst where OFFER_INST_ID=#{OFFER_INST_ID}), offer_id = (select OFFER_ID from offer_inst where OFFER_INST_ID=#{OFFER_INST_ID}), prod_id = (select prod_id from offer_prod_inst_rel where OFFER_INST_ID=#{OFFER_INST_ID}), resources_num = 1, start_date = #{DATE}, end_date = #{DATE}, start_time = #{STARTTIME}, end_time = #{ENDTIME}, OCCUPY_TYPE = 0, RECORD_TIME = now()
mapper.select: select contact_user from contact where user_name=#{userName}
mapper.insert: INSERT into customer_service set serial = #{serial}, user_name = #{userName}, reservation_date = #{reservationDate}, reservation_time = #{reservationTime}, contact_name = #{contactName}, prod_inst_id = #{prodInstId}, status = #{serial}
